mapper.select: select email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno, date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d')regdate from member
mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{mname}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{photo}, #{ctno})
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, mname = #{mname}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, photo = #{photo}, ctno = #{ctno}
mapper.insert: insert into member_auth(email, auth) values(#{email}, ROLE_MEMBER)
mapper.select: select auth from member_auth where email = #{email}
